projects.title: Wordibly
projects.contributions: Brand, Product, Web Design, Design System, Illustration, Motion,
projects.about: Wordibly is a platform that offers both AI and human transcription services. We built the brand from the ground up (aside from their logo mark) and incorporated the new visual identity into the marketing website and the product, focusing on establishing a friendly, human look and feel.

projects.title: Cotulla
projects.about: Cotulla is a cloud-based platform for oil & gas operators, offering advanced analytics and data visualization capabilities to optimize production and improve operational efficiency.

projects.title: Aviation.edu
projects.about: Aviation.edu is an online learning platform dedicated to providing comprehensive resources and courses for aspiring pilots and aviation enthusiasts, covering everything from flight theory to aircraft maintenance.

projects.title: Somatic Living
projects.about: Somatic Living is a wellness brand focused on holistic health practices, offering resources and guidance for mindfulness, movement, and emotional well-being to help individuals achieve greater self-awareness and inner harmony.

projects.title: Fastly
projects.about: Fastly is a high-performance cloud platform that provides edge cloud services, including CDN, security, and streaming, designed to accelerate and protect websites and applications. The platform helps businesses deliver exceptional digital experiences to their global audiences.

projects.title: Bloom
projects.about: Bloom is an application designed to foster personal growth and well-being, offering guided meditations, journaling prompts, and habit tracking to help users cultivate positive routines and achieve their personal goals. It emphasizes a gentle and supportive approach to self-improvement.
